title: Online Alarm Clock
description: Set the hour and minute for the online alarm clock. The alarm message will appear, and the preselected sound will be played at the set time.
keywords: online alarm clock, alarm clock, alarm clocks, online clock, wake up, alarm clock for free, alarm clock app, internet alarm clock, virtual alarm clock, free alarm clock, hours, minutes, virtual clock
how_to_use_title: How to Use the Online Alarm Clock
how_to_use_intro: This guide will help you use our online alarm clock effectively. Follow these steps to set up and manage your alarms.
setting_alarm_desc: Choose the hour and minute from the dropdown menus, then click 'Start' to begin the countdown. Use 'Stop' to cancel the alarm.
quick_times_desc: Use the quick time buttons (5:00 AM to 8:30 AM) to set common alarm times instantly and start the alarm immediately.
sounds_desc: Select a sound from the dropdown and use the preview button to listen before setting it as your alarm sound.
sharing_desc: Share this alarm clock with others using the social media buttons below the controls, including Twitter, Facebook, Threads, Reddit, and Weibo.
alarm_message: Your alarm has ended. Click to dismiss or use the close button.
timer_message: Your timer has ended. Click to dismiss or use the close button.
how_to_use_countdown: How to Use the Online Countdown
how_to_use_countdown_desc: Select a holiday from the dropdown to start the countdown. The timer will show the remaining days, hours, minutes, and seconds until the holiday. If the holiday has passed, it will indicate that the holiday has been reached.
how_to_use_world_time_desc: View times for major cities by default. Use the dropdown to add additional timezones. Added timezones will appear below the default list. Select a timezone from the list to add it, and it will no longer appear in the dropdown once added.
how_to_use_date_calculator_desc: Use the tabs to switch between calculating days between two dates, adding days to a date, or subtracting days from a date. Use the 'Today' button to quickly set the current date. Input dates or numbers, and the result will update automatically.
how_to_use_hours_calculator_desc: Enter the start and end times using the time inputs to calculate the hours between them. The result will update automatically when you change the times. Note that it assumes times are on the same day or handles a simple day transition.
date_calculator_description: Calculate the number of days between dates. You can also use this date calculator to add or subtract days, weeks, months, and years from a given date.
hours_calculator_description: Calculate total hours between two times, and easily add or subtract hours from any time with this simple hours calculator.
world_time_description: View the current time around the world. The world clock displays current local times from major cities across the globe.
countdown_title: Online Countdown - Countdown Timer to Any Date
countdown_description: Count the days, hours, minutes, and seconds until an event like your birthday or holiday with this easy, free online date countdown.
timer_title: Online Timer - Timer with an Alarm
timer_description: Set a timer on your computer using an easy-to-use online timer.
stopwatch_description: Start a stopwatch for free online and record your laps in hours, minutes, seconds, and milliseconds.
